headline: A Look at Newmont’s (NEM) Valuation Following Its Recent Share Price Gain
summary: Newmont (NEM) shares have gained over 1% in the past day, following a steady trend higher this month. Investors appear curious about what is behind this rise, especially with no new major announcements. See our latest analysis for Newmont. Newmont’s latest share price jump continues what has been a remarkable run in 2024, with a 1.21% single-day share price move adding to its 13.41% one-month and 139.33% year-to-date share price return. Momentum is clearly building, as the company not only...

headline: Adyton Resources Welcomes Lihir Deposit Expert Dr. Erin Johns to the Team to Drive Feni Gold-Copper Project Development
summary: NOT FOR DISSEMINATION IN THE UNITED STATES OR FOR DISTRIBUTION TO U.S. NEWSWIRE SERVICES Brisbane, Australia--(Newsfile Corp. - December 2, 2025) - Adyton Resources Corporation (TSXV: ADY) ("Adyton" or the "Company") is very pleased to announce the appointment of Dr. Erin Johns to its technical team, focusing on the Company's flagship Feni Gold-Copper Project in Papua New Guinea. HIGHLIGHTSWorld-Class Lihir Au Deposit Expertise: Dr. Johns completed her PhD research specifically on the Lihir Gold
